topics.body:
...Is anyone still here?

*Another monster*

Who keeps coming up with these!?

Shouketsu! (Sintering!)

!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111106210646/metalheroes/images/7/78/Shaider.jpg!
Space sheriff Shaider!

*Shaider's Sintering process only takes 1 millisecond. To explain the process of this transformation, Shaider Showers himself with Plasma blue energy from the Vavilos, It takes a mere 1 millisecond to go through the entire process.*

Let's take this outside punk! TOH!

I need to find a fitting pone for worst buddy Warren Clyde, best buddy (so far) Bai [Something long and Chinese], and The Jackal.
